name: Get Student Loan Calculation for Max Loan Principal

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier

When I request a principal calculation for a loan with values
| loanType | amount | term | repayment | repayment Frequency |
| student | 25000.0 | 48 | 600 | monthly |

Then I should get the following values returned
| loanAmount | termInMonths | monthlyRepaymentAmount | fortnightlyRepaymentAmount | weeklyRepaymentAmount |
| 6827.49 | 12 | 600 | 276.92 | 138.46 |
| 13060.51 | 24 | 600 | 276.92 | 138.46 |
| 18714.9 | 36 | 600 | 276.92 | 138.46 |
| 23856.85 | 48 | 600 | 276.92 | 138.46 |
| 28530.67 | 60 | 600 | 276.92 | 138.46 |

title: Get Student Loan Calculation for Max Loan Principal
